overview:
Rabih is an enterpreneur and technologist with over 19 years of international experience. Prior to apstrata, he was SVP of Engineering for Vidavee (acquired by Vignette/OpenText), in 2002 he founded element^n Inc, the mother company of apstrata and is still leading it as CEO, prior to that he co-founded and served as SVP of Engineering for Super11.net, which grew at the time into one of the largest Latin American Internet and Application Service Providers and portals. In addition Rabih held different positions at BroadVision Inc. (BVSN) and Navlink (AT&T subsidiary) and co-founded PortalElements and DigiSys.
